name: Dashie's Puh-ranormal Activity
summary: Dashie's Puh-ranormal Activity is a 3D comedy/horror game developed for the YouTuber Dashie. (YouTube: DashieGames, DashieXP, DashieXP2). The game features various references to Dashie's skits and videos. In this game, Dashie is being haunted by the ghost of his ex and must find a way to survive.
